page.title: 07PUBLIC SERVICES-BEDWORTH
page.content: {FIRE STATION}.Built in 1958.8 full- time officers & 10 part time firemen. Fire prevention officer employed. Station manned between 9 & 5 hrs daily.Officers contacted by "bleepers" after office hrs.Approximately 720 fires annually,mostly houses,but some industrial.Information gained from central computer when dealing with special fires.Officers inspect factories,offices & schools,giving advice.Officers called to motorway accidents.{ {POST OFFICE}Bedworth P.O. employs postmen working 43 hrs a wk,delivering letters & parcels to 11750 homes. Exhall sub P.O.has been open for 65 yrs.A wooden sorting office is attached with 6 people working to sort & deliver mail.Mon & Thurs are busy, with pensions & family allowances.1000 people daily use P.O. facilities.
